7   package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.test.domain;
8   
9   
10  
11  import java.text.DateFormat;
12  import java.text.ParseException;
13  import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
14  import java.util.Date;
15  import java.util.HashMap;
16  import java.util.Map;
17  
18  public class HolidayCalendar {
19  
20  
21  	private Long id;
22  	// Date -> String
23  	private Map holidays = new HashMap();
24  
25  	public HolidayCalendar init() {
26  		DateFormat df = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy.MM.dd");
27  		try {
28  			holidays.clear();
29  			holidays.put(df.parse("2009.01.01"), "New Year's Day");
30  			holidays.put(df.parse("2009.02.14"), "Valentine's Day");
31  			holidays.put(df.parse("2009.11.11"), "Armistice Day");
32  		} catch (ParseException e) {
33  			throw new RuntimeException(e);
34  		}
35  		return this;
36  	}
37  
38  	public Map getHolidays() {
39  		return holidays;
40  	}
41  
42  	protected void setHolidays(Map holidays) {
43  		this.holidays = holidays;
44  	}
45  
46  	public void addHoliday(Date d, String name) {
47  		holidays.put(d, name);
48  	}
49  
50  	public String getHoliday(Date d) {
51  		return (String)holidays.get(d);
52  	}
53  
54  	public boolean isHoliday(Date d) {
55  		return holidays.containsKey(d);
56  	}
57  
58  	protected Long getId() {
59  		return id;
60  	}
61  
62  	protected void setId(Long id) {
63  		this.id = id;
64  	}
65  }
66
